entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned looking at her watch and expressing shock that they haven't practiced the Impediment Curse. She tells Harry to get some sleep.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as needing to practice the Impediment Curse with Hermione and Ron. He also thinks about Neville's situation and feels anger towards those who tortured his parents.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned going up to their dormitory with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville's situation is discussed by Harry, who feels sympathy for him. His parents are also mentioned as being tortured.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned in the context of Neville keeping a secret from Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch's son is mentioned as being part of a crowd that jeered at Harry.

entities.name: mr. longbottom
entities.description: Mr. Longbottom is mentioned as being tortured by the people who also tortured Neville's parents.

entities.name: mrs. longbottom
entities.description: Mrs. Longbottom is mentioned as being tortured by the people who also tortured Neville's parents.

entities.name: impediment curse
entities.description: The Impediment Curse is mentioned as something that Harry, Ron, and Hermione are supposed to practice.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are friends who are practicing the Impediment Curse together.
Harry feels sympathy for Neville's situation, where his parents are still alive but unable to recognize him.
Ron and Hermione are friends who are practicing the Impediment Curse with Harry.
Harry feels anger towards Crouch's son, who was part of a crowd that jeered at him.

relationships.entity_1: people who tortured mr. and mrs. longbottom
relationships.description: The people who tortured Neville's parents are also responsible for torturing Mr. and Mrs. Longbottom.
Harry feels sympathy for Mr. and Mrs. Longbottom, who were tortured by the people who also tortured Neville's parents.
